snippet.title: Doukyuusei: Bangin’ Summer OP Movie (English)
snippet.description:
DOUKYUUSEI is the original dating sim. The hottest adventure of 1992, back to break new hearts in 2022.

Wishlist DOUKYUUSEI: Bangin' Summer, right now on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1689910/Doukyuusei/

Opening Theme: "Hitonatsu Memory"
Composition & Lyrics: Puyo Suzuki
Vocals: Marie

＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝

Our hero has spent the first half of his summer engaging in meaningful and productive labor.
Now he's flush with cash. Time to go pick up chicks!
Hit on some outrageous babes, get to know them better, and come together on a deeper level.
Summer's back. Back again...

This is a full remake of the 1992 PC game "DOUKYUUSEI."

＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝

Wishlist DOUKYUUSEI right now on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1689910/Doukyuusei/

Swing by our website!
https://shiravune.com/

Follow Shiravune on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/shiravune
Or join us on Discord:
https://discord.gg/qBmrqDy
Or follow us on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/shiravune/

* This international version, released in 2022, is based on the 2021 Japanese remaster "Doukyuusei: Remake", developed by Fanza Games and SILKY'S PLUS, which was itself based on the 1992 original version of "Doukyuusei" developed by Elf.
